content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-life experiences. However, I can suggest checking online forums and websites dedicated to accessible travel, where travelers with disabilities often share their experiences and tips on travel destinations, including Bled. One such website is "Accessible Travel Forum," where users can join discussions and ask for advice from other community members who have traveled to Bled with disabilities. Additionally, Bled's official tourism website provides information on accessible accommodations, activities, and transportation in the area.
